title: Base Component
description: The base schema for all ECS components.

title.description: The human-readable, PascalCase name of the object (e.g., 'UniversalPhysicsState').

description.description: A clear, complete sentence explaining the object's purpose and function within the system.

schema_version.description: The semantic version of this schema definition (e.g., '1.0.0').

physics_properties.title: Base Physics Properties
physics_properties.description: Defines the common physics-related properties for components and laws.

collapse_sensitive.description: Indicates if the object is affected by or triggers quantum collapse.

engine.description: The physics engine responsible for this object.

is_quantum.description: Indicates if the object has quantum properties.
